ProductInfo.Features:
NEW Professional Grade High Definition Bullet IP Network 720p Security Camera
1/4" Omnivision 1MP CMOS Progressive Scan Sensor / Texas Instruments DaVinci Processor / Supports ONVIF / 30 Frames Per Second

12mm (4, 6, 8, 16mm Optional) Fixed Lens / 260 feet 4x 42mm Array IR LEDs For Dark & No Light Environment
